Space Game.Description: The Space Game is a 2-stage reward-related decision making task adapted for children
Space Game.DatasetType: derivitive - summary data produced by code/SpaceGame_WF.py

all_earth_rt_mean.Description: mean reaction time across all trials for the earth stage - selection of rockets

all_earth_rt_median.Description: median reaction time across all trials for the earth stage - selection of rockets

all_earth_n_miss.Description: number of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the earth stage

all_earth_p_miss.Description: percent of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the earth stage

all_planet_rt_mean.Description: mean reaction time across all trials for the planet stage - asking for space gold

all_planet_rt_median.Description: median reaction time across all trials for the planet stage - asking for space gold

all_planet_n_miss.Description: number of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the planet stage

all_planet_p_miss.Description: percent of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the planet stage

all_avg_reward.Description: average points available to earn each trial

all_reward_rate_corrected.Description: difference between average points earned per trial and the average reward available per trial

all_prob_sameplanet_earthsame.Description: probability of choosing the same planet given the earth stage (rocketship pairing) is the same as previous trial

all_prob_sameplanet_earthdiff.Description: probability of choosing the same planet given the earth stage (rocketship pairing) is the different from the previous trial

b1_earth_rt_mean.Description: block 1 only - mean reaction time for the earth stage (selection of rockets)

b1_earth_rt_median.Description: block 1 only - median reaction time for the earth stage (selection of rockets)

b1_earth_n_miss.Description: block 1 only - number of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the earth stage

b1_earth_p_miss.Description: block 1 only - percent of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the earth stage

b1_planet_rt_mean.Description: block 1 only - mean reaction time for the planet stage - asking for space gold

b1_planet_rt_median.Description: block 1 only - median reaction time for the planet stage - asking for space gold

b1_planet_n_miss.Description: block 1 only - number of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the planet stage

b1_planet_p_miss.Description: block 1 only - percent of trials where the participant timed out before responding on the planet stage

b1_reward_rate.Description: block 1 only - average points earned per trial

b1_avg_reward.Description: block 1 only - average points available to earn each trial

b1_reward_rate_corrected.Description: block 1 only - difference between average points earned per trial and the average reward available per trial

b1_prob_sameplanet_earthsame.Description: block 1 only - probability of choosing the same planet given the earth stage (rocketship pairing) is the same as previous trial

b1_prob_sameplanet_earthdiff.Description: block 1 only - probability of choosing the same planet given the earth stage (rocketship pairing) is the different from the previous trial
